summary: Ego vehicle approaches a building entrance with a barrier. Pedestrians and scooter riders are present.
actions: Ego vehicle moves forward slowly. Pedestrians walk across the road. Scooter riders move in both directions.
key_objects: Ego vehicle, pedestrians, scooter riders, barrier, building entrance
key_actions: Pedestrians crossing the road, scooter riders approaching from both directions.
next_action: Ego vehicle will likely continue moving forward, navigating around pedestrians and scooter riders.
